title: Home - Cactus Naturopathy and Acupuncture
description: Cactus Naturopathy & Acupuncture is a holistic, integrative clinic offering naturopathic supportive care to the greater Seattle area.
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Safety Update 5/25/2022: We are open for in-person visits for Naturopathic medicine, Acupuncture, and Chinese herbal medicine! Telehealth visits are also available. In an effort to best protect our patients the following will be required: - A mask will worn by patient and provider at all times - Temperature checks prior to the start of any appointment - COVID-19 symptom questionnaire - Rooms will be sanitized between visits with an appropriate cleaning agent If any signs or symptoms concerning for COVID-19 infection are present at your appointment we'd be happy to help you reschedule. We appreciate your understanding in these difficult times. Integrative Medicine Our Focus Dr. Geoffrey Bender, ND, EAMP (He/Him) Specializes in the care of adult patients, and focuses on Primary Care, Rheumatology, and Mental Health. He uses a blend of Naturopathic medicine and Chinese medicine to treat a variety of complaints including colds, headaches, pain, digestive problems, and much more.
